definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: The spacesuits worn by astronauts are made through special processes.
sentences.chinese: 宇航服都是经过特殊工艺制作的。

sentences.english: During that walk, the astronaut or taikonaut also will test a new Chinese-made spacesuit.
sentences.chinese: 其间，中国宇航员还将对中国制造的宇航服进行测试。

sentences.english: Tonight I'm going to talk about the most basic aspect of survival-the space suit.
sentences.chinese: 今天我会讲一些基础的外太空生活的事情，宇航服。

sentences.english: It can be said that there are built-in spacesuits on Earth the best equipment, air-conditioning thermostat.
sentences.chinese: 可以说宇航服内装有地球上最好的空调恒温设备。

sentences.english: The clear, plastic helmet also protects against radiation and micrometeoroids.
sentences.chinese: 宇航服的透明头盔，也能够抵御射线和高速太空微粒。

sentences.english: The Feitian is like a mini space ship.
sentences.chinese: 飞天宇航服就象一个微型宇航器。

sentences.english: l The clear, plastic helmet also protects against radiation and micrometeoroids.
sentences.chinese: 宇航服的透明头盔，也能够抵御射线和高速太空微粒。
